Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: When the credentials renewal fails because the user was deleted.

Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.name: isAccessDenied

Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.name: isTooManyAttempts

Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.name: isVerificationRequired

Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.name: isPasswordLeaked
Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: When the password used was reported to be leaked.

Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.name: isLoginRequired
Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: When performing Web Auth login with prompt: "none" and the Auth0 session has expired.

Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.name: isNetworkError
Structs/AuthenticationError.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: When the request failed due to network issues.

Global%20Variables.html#/s:5Auth012defau.name: defaultScope
Global%20Variables.html#/s:5Auth012defau.abstract: Default scope value used across Auth0.swift. Equals to openid profile email.

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.name: emailVerified(_:connection:)
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: Set the verified status of the email.

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.name: phoneNumber(_:verified:verify:connection:clientId:)
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: Change the phone number of the user (SMS connection only).

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.name: phoneVerified(_:connection:)
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html#/s:5Aut.abstract: Set the verified status of the phone number.

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: accessToken
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: Token that can be used to make authenticated requests to the specified API (the audience value used on login).

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: refreshToken
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: Token that can be used to request a new access token.

Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.name: recoveryCode
Classes/Credentials.html#/s:5Auth011Cred.abstract: MFA recovery code that the application must display to the user, to be stored securely for future use.

Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@M@Auth0@obj.name: description
Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@M@Auth0@obj.abstract: Custom description that redacts the tokens with <REDACTED>.

Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@CM@Auth0@ob.name: supportsSecureCoding
Classes/Credentials.html#/c:@CM@Auth0@ob.abstract: Property that enables secure coding. Equals to true.

Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html.name: UserPatchAttributes
Classes/UserPatchAttributes.html.abstract: User attributes that can be updated using the patch() method of Users.
